nav.tagline: Personalized practice to build real mastery.

hero.title: Learn Anything,
hero.subtitle: The world's first truly adaptive learning platform. Our proprietary AI creates personalized learning paths that evolve with each student in real-time.

problem.title: The $8 Trillion Education Problem
problem.subtitle: Traditional education is broken. One-size-fits-all approaches fail 85% of students.

stat1.label: of students feel disengaged with current learning methods

stat2.label: of enterprises report skill gaps in their workforce

stat3.label: higher dropout rates with non-personalized content

solution.title: Introducing Edusistent
solution.subtitle: AI That Truly Understands Learning
solution.description: Unlike generic AI tutors, Edusistent uses proprietary cognitive modeling to understand exactly where each learner struggles and why. Our system adapts not just difficulty‚Äîbut teaching style, content format, and pacing.

adaptive.title: Cognitive AI Engine
adaptive.description: Our proprietary neural architecture models individual learning patterns with 94% accuracy‚Äîfar beyond simple difficulty adjustment.

video.title: Any Content, Any Format
video.description: Works with video, text, code, simulations. Automatically analyzes and structures content for optimal learning.

feedback.title: Real-Time Intelligence
feedback.description: Millisecond response times with context-aware feedback. Students never wait, never get stuck.

progress.title: Predictive Analytics
progress.description: Know exactly when students will master concepts. Identify at-risk learners before they fall behind.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Ready
enterprise.description: SOC 2 compliant, SSO integration, custom branding. Deploy on-premise or cloud. Full API access.

multilingual.title: Global Scale
multilingual.description: Native support for 50+ languages. Cultural adaptation ensures relevance across markets.

useCases.title: Built for Scale
useCases.subtitle: From individual learners to Fortune 500 enterprises

b2c.title: For Learners
b2c.description: Master any skill with AI that adapts to your unique learning style

b2b.title: For Enterprises
b2b.description: Upskill your workforce 3x faster with measurable outcomes

b2b2c.title: For EdTech & Universities

step1.title: Analyze
step1.description: AI assesses knowledge, learning style, and optimal pathways in the first 5 minutes.

step2.title: Personalize
step2.description: Content dynamically adapts‚Äîdifficulty, format, pacing, examples‚Äîall in real-time.

step3.title: Engage
step3.description: Interactive practice with instant feedback. AI tutoring when you need it most.

step4.title: Master
step4.description: Spaced repetition and adaptive review ensure skills stick for life.
